channel.title: games on Hugo Lazzari's Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in games on Hugo Lazzari's Personal Blog

item.title: About games
item.description: so I finally got a switch I got it this last holiday season and started with a few games: animal crossing: new horizons, the legend of Zelda: breath of the wild, Mario kart 8 deluxe. and man I thought I would be addicted to breath of the wild and I was wrong I barely play it instead I play animal crossing: new horizons every day and really good to customize the whole island sometimes it’s annoying to collect fruits and stuff but overall it’s really relaxing
